vote.text: Amendment SA 4400 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4400 proposed by Senator Casey for Senator Leahy. (consideration: CR S5496-5497; text: CR S5496-5497) To amend the preamble.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4400 proposed by Senator Casey for Senator Leahy.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4400 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
